comment: He got beaten as thoroughly as a fighter could be beaten in an MMA match -- out-struck, out-grappled, knocked down, pounded and submitted. And the delusional little primadonna has the nerve to feel entitled to a rematch. Ask yourself, if Nurmagomedov had lost and asked for a rematch, do you think Conor McGregor would do anything other than laugh?
